code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{Navigate}from'react-router-dom';import{AuthContext}from'../context/AuthContext';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AdminRoute=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const{user,loading}=useContext(AuthContext);if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"d-flex justify-content-center align-items-center",style:{minHeight:'200px'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"spinner-border text-primary",role:"status",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"visually-hidden",children:"Loading..."})})});}if(!user||user.role!=='admin'){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/login"});}return children;};export default AdminRoute;
